text: Dot and the Kangaroo is a 1977 Australian animation adventure family movie in live action. It is based on the children’s book of the same name made by Ethel Pedley. ==Cast== * Barbara Frawley as the Voice of Dot * Joan Bruce as the Voices of the Kangaroo and Dot’s Mother Category:1977 movies Category:Australian comedy movies Category:1977 adventure movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Australian adventure movies Category:1977 comedy movies Category:1970s comedy-drama movies Category:1977 drama movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Movies about children Category:Movies about mammals Category:Movies set in the 1880s Category:1970s musical movies Category:Australian musical movies Category:Buddy comedy movies Category:1970s independent movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Dot and the Kangaroo (movie)
